description:
Create a new VM with a name like "testvm1" with the  default cirros image
Wait for it to be acitve and SSH able.
ssh to the guest VM just created.
check the hostname - it is "cirros" instead of the expected hostname "testvm1"
title: guest vm hostname is not set to the instance name

comments.content: I have tested in the devstack, and it reproduced. And the password setted when deploying is not effective too. The password is still the default one that making the image.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~lisong-cruise

comments.content: The hostname is usually set by the config_drive.  You have to set "force_config_drive = always" in /etc/nova/nova.conf.  I have tried this with the latest devstack and using the ubuntu cloud image.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~thang-pham
